cause.description:
Support The World's Health. Cannabis is the new miracle drug of today's diseases. Grow Cannabis Sativa of your own, and save lives. THINK about it. Glaucoma itself kills millions a year, just imagine the possibilities.
1. Allow U.S. citizens to conduct their own research, and grow Marijuana
2. Smoke weed everyday
cause.mission: Plant it, feed it, cut it, bag it, put it to good use
cause.name: Glaucoma Research
